markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Celestial Peachwood Sword](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1533)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Good" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=83" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Positive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=128" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 18</row>

**Price** 15,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

From blade to pommel, this sword is carved from a branch of the now-extinct celestial peach tree. The blade of this _+3 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [disrupting](/Equipment.aspx?ID=294) [holy](/Equipment.aspx?ID=299) [peachwood](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1543) [shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43)_ has ancient runes that can permanently destroy the most powerful [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160)—if you are willing to pay the price. An undead creature of 12th level or lower that takes damage from a Strike with the sword takes 10d6 positive damage (DC 35 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=326) Fortitude save). This damage is separate from the Strike itself and isn't included in any effect based on the Strike's damage.

<document level="2" id="action-1162" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Celestial Peachwood Sword

text: <title level="1" right="Item 17" pfs="Standard" > Celestial Peachwood Sword Source Book of the Dead pg. 18 Price 15,000 gp Usage held in 1 hand Bulk L Base Weapon Shortsword --- From blade to pommel, this sword is carved from a branch of the now-extinct celestial peach tree. The blade of this +3 greater striking disrupting holy peachwood shortsword has ancient runes that can permanently destroy the most powerful undead—if you are willing to pay the price. An undead creature of 12th level or lower that takes damage from a Strike with the sword takes 10d6 positive damage (DC 35 basic Fortitude save). This damage is separate from the Strike itself and isn't included in any effect based on the Strike's damage.
